official_title: Evaluation of DNA Methylation Signatures in Diagnosis and Management of Thyroid Nodules
inclusion_criteria:
* Patients without impaired decision-making capacity and who are undergoing needle biopsies for thyroid nodule diagnosis
* Over the age of 18
* Any gender, race and ethnicity
* Patients must provide informed consent prior to use of their tissues and clinical data
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Children are excluded from the study, since the biology of children thyroid nodules is different from adults
